page.title: 19A HARPUR HILL GIRL'S DAY
page.content: { My name is{Amanda Baker} and I am the only girl in this group to live in Harpur Hill. I live at{55 Fernydale {Avenue}in a council house which we have bought. It has 3 bedrooms. I get up at 7.30 and leave for school at 8.00. We go to the shop on the way and buy sweets. At school we have 2 lessons of 35 minutes and then 20 minutes break. After 2 more lessons it is lunch time. There are four more lessons in the afternoon and another break. I leave school as quickly as I can at 3.45pm. and walk back through the woods. After school I always take my dogs up to Solomon's Temple. They run around and I look at the view. I go to my nanna's and go home for 9pm I like to watch TV at night but not doing my homework. I go to bed late.
